PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04462025-03-15FIN
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Schedule 2 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act and the Fuel Charge Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending SCHEDULE 2 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT and the FUEL CHARGE REGULATIONS in order to set applicable fuel charge rates for all types of fuel and combustible waste to zero after March 31, 2025.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0107 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending SCHEDULE 2 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT and the FUEL CHARGE REGULATIONS in order to set applicable fuel charge rates for all types of fuel and combustible waste to zero after March 31, 2025.
